titleStmt.title: A proclamation for regulating the post-office. Edinburgh, the twenty ninth day of November, one thousand six hundred eighty and nine years.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, by order of Privy Council,

notesStmt.note: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Gilb: Eliot, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: cropped and stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
